parameter.name: hasReleaseEvent
parameter.label: Released Event Capability
parameter.description: Set to true only if your Channel has a 'release' event. Mandatory for long press detection.

parameter.name: maxRepetition
parameter.label: Maximum Repetition
parameter.description: This is the maximum number of repetition to do for a long press.

parameter.name: pressedEventOrState
parameter.label: Pressed Event Or State
parameter.description: The profile will interpret this custom event/state as "Pressed". Use this if the event is not automatically recognized.

parameter.name: releasedEventOrState
parameter.label: Released Event Or State
parameter.description: The profile will interpret this custom event/state as "Released". Use this if the event is not automatically recognized.

parameter.name: delay
parameter.label: Delay Between Events
parameter.description: Multi-press : for this profile to see a multi-press event, each new button press should occur within this delay (ms). Long press : delay (ms) between two events sent to the item

parameter.name: numberOfPress
parameter.label: Number Of Press
parameter.description: The profile will react only to this number of press.
